message: A mysterious gas begins to pour into the arena, causing the tributes to relax.

outcomes.message: {victim} take[Vs a|] deep breath[V|s] and feel[Vs|] rejuvenated.
{victim} feel[Vs|] their senses heighten, and they manage to find a weapon in the grass.
{attacker} and {victim} stop fighting for the moment after {attacker} agree[As|] to "Chill out dude[A|s]...".
{victim}'s blood pressure was too low and the gas kills them!
{victim} use[Vs|] their clothing as a mask to avoid inhaling the gas.
